column1: Smoque BBQ////Spent a weekend in Chicago and chose Smoque over the competition. No regrets! The ribs were great and the sides were just as good. Some of the best coleslaw around. Everyone at my table raved about the mac & cheese and I wish I would have tried the brisket
column2: it looked delicious. Next time I am in Chicago I will make another stop here
column3: no need to look any further.
